identity.name: E1 Control Room
identity.description: A professional command center for e-commerce operations. Prioritizes data density and clarity over decoration. Uses high-contrast typography and strict grids to manage complex pricing data.

usage.primary: Brand identity, active states, primary buttons
usage.accent: Critical actions (Save, Update), alerts, high-priority toggles

structure.sidebar: w-64 fixed h-full bg-slate-950 text-white border-r border-slate-800 z-50 hidden md:block
structure.topbar: h-16 border-b bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md sticky top-0 z-40 flex items-center px-6 justify-between

StoreSelector.description: A prominent dropdown in the top bar to switch contexts.
StoreSelector.style: h-10 w-[200px] border-slate-200 bg-white shadow-sm hover:bg-slate-50 transition-colors
StoreSelector.interaction: Must trigger a global state update for the 'current store'.

PriceTable.description: The core workspace. High density, sticky header.
PriceTable.header: bg-slate-100/50 text-xs font-bold uppercase text-slate-500 h-10 sticky top-0
PriceTable.row: border-b border-slate-100 hover:bg-blue-50/30 transition-colors h-12 group
features: Mono font for SKU and Price

InlineEdit.description: Click-to-edit functionality for prices and dates.

states.default: text-slate-900 cursor-pointer hover:text-blue-600 hover:underline decoration-dotted underline-offset-4

InlineEdit.input_style: h-8 w-24 px-2 text-right font-mono text-sm border-blue-500 ring-1 ring-blue-500 rounded-sm focus:outline-none

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors defined in 'colors.palette'.
3. LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component that includes the Sidebar and Topbar.
4. STATE: Use a simple React Context or State to manage the 'selectedStore' globally.
5. TABLE: Build a robust 'ProductTable' component. Do NOT use a generic data grid library if possible; build a clean HTML table for maximum styling control as per the 'PriceTable' specs.
6. EDITING: Implement the 'InlineEdit' pattern. Clicking a price should swap the text for an input. Blurring or pressing Enter should save.
7. MOCK DATA: Generate a realistic list of 10-20 products with SKUs, Names, Prices, and Special Prices to populate the table.
8. LOGIN: Create a simple, clean 'LoginPage' centered on the screen for the Magento credentials.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
Ensure all inputs have a clear focus state (ring-2 ring-primary/20).
Use 'sonner' for toast notifications on successful saves.
Keep the UI 'dense' - avoid excessive padding in the data table rows.
